scene:
Gold Saucer - Meeting Cait Sith
Arrival at Gold Saucer Exploring Gold Saucer Meeting Cait Sith Battle Square
Cloud and the others take the Ropeway from North Corel up to Gold Saucer. Chocobo MascotWelcome to the Gold Saucer. If Cloud attempts to enter without paying, he's stopped by the admissions lady. Admissions LadyPlease buy your ticket here. Admissions LadyWelcome to the Gold Saucer.Are you together? A single pass is 3000 gil, or you can purchase a lifetime pass for 30000 gil. Cloud- Pay 3000 gil- Pay 30000 gil- Don't pay
Pay 3000 gil Admissions LadyThank you very much.If you leave Gold Saucer, your tickets become invalid.
Pay 30000 gil Admissions LadyThank you very much.If you have a Gold Ticket, you can come and go freely into the park... as long as you don't lose it.
Admissions LadyHere at the Gold Saucer, there are many places where you must pay with GP.Just think of 'GP' as money that you can only use at the Gold Saucer.GP can only be redeemed at the games in Wonder Square and at the Chocobo Races.Your GP limit is 10000, so please be careful.Please enjoy yourselves. Moving on through the entrance, they find themselves in the central hub of Gold Saucer, called the Station. AerithWow! Let's have fun!I know this isn't the right time to do this.Hey, Barret, cheer up! Barret......I ain't in no cheery mood. So jes' leave me alone. AerithReally? That's too bad. She runs over to Cloud and grabs his arm. Let's go! Tifa....whisper... whisper... (Wasn't that a little harsh, Aerith!?) Aerith...whisper... whisper... (Just act normal when this happens) Tifa...whisper... (You think so...?) AerithOf course! She runs back over to Barret. We're gonna go play... BarretSo PLAY! ...messin' round #@^%$!Don't forget we're after Sephiroth! He runs over and jumps down the tube leading to Wonder Square. Aerith...I think he's mad. TifaHe'll be fine. He seems to be doing a little better now. AerithI wish we could just forget everything and have fun! TifaWe'd better be careful, Sephiroth might be around. Red XIII......You want to go with me? YuffieWith me!? If Cloud tries to leave the Station alone, one of them will run up to him...
AerithCloud!Don't go alone, go with me! TifaCloud!I'll go with you. Red XIIICloud!Don't go by yourself... YuffieCloud!Let's go together, Cloud!
Info Board inside the StationWelcome to Gold Saucer!Many attractions await you here at Gold Saucer.You will be moved and excited, thrilled and terrified! Led from one zone to another...unlike anything you've ever experienced! Make your memories... today.Shinra"Now in: Gold Gate" Let's access all of the Attractions!"Event Square" An entertaining show is awaiting you."Chocobo Square" Chocobo Racing takes you into the world of Virtual Reality! Wark! Wark!"Ghost Square" Please come and stay at the hotel..... Ha ha ha..."Battle Square" Go to the limits in heated battles! Try your hand at the special Gold Attack!!"Round Square" Take a tour of the Park and see the beautiful night scenery of Gold Saucer..."Speed Square" A Shooting Roller Coaster is waiting to take you into the world of excitement."Wonder Square" A number of Games await you here. Collect GP at Wonder Square and play some more! Cloud chooses one member of the group to accompany him, and they set off to explore Gold Saucer. At Chocobo Square... A bunch of Shinra soldiers are gathered on the steps.
AerithWhat happened? TifaWhat? Red XIIIWhat happened? YuffieWhat is it?
CloudSh...!Shinra soldiers... Even here... SoldierAttention! Dismissed!! The soldiers disperse to different areas of the Gold Saucer, and after a moment Cloud heads up the stairs. Lady at EntranceWelcome to Chocobo Racing. Man BettingI... I lost... Or, sometimes: Yeahh! This is why I can't seem to quit. ManYou can only buy up to 3 tickets. Think before you buy. For example, you could select half of the Chocobos and buy 3 boxes. Cloud- Boxes?- Not interested ManA box is buying 3 combinations of 2 chocobos.For example, if you select Chocobo 1, 3, and 5, you can purchase combinations, such as 1-3, 1-5, 3-5.You can also play the limited wheel by selecting a Chocobo. Cloud- Limited wheel?- Not interested ManPlaying a 'Limited wheel' means you select a Chocobo and use it in all of your combinations.For example, if you have Chocobo 1, then you buy 1-2, 1-3, 1-4.No matter how you make your bet, you win some and you lose some. It all comes down to insight and luck. Security (near Jockey Lounge)I'm sorry, but this is for authorized personnel only. Blond ManWe usually buy tickets for the B rank and C rank races, right? Cloud- Rank?- Not interested Blond ManIn other words, 'rank' means the Chocobo's 'strength'. A is highest and C's the lowest.When you become a Free Chocobo jockey, you'll be able to buy A rank tickets.Of course, the higher the rank, the better your item ticket. Hey, maybe I'll become a Chocobo jockey!? Cloud- How DO you become one?- Not interested Blond ManYou can become one if you own a Chocobo... and have some connections. But Chocobo's are pretty hard to catch and I don't have any connections. WomanHey, what's that Chocobo on the odds sheet? RedheadThat's how you can find out a Chocobo's condition and strengths. WomanHmm, If you can tell which ones are the strongest, then it's easy... RedheadWell, not as easy as you think. It's not just a matter of the Chocobo's strength,but it also depends on the jockey and the Chocobo's personality.If these are bad, they may use too much stamina, and affect other things. Lady at the Ticket DeskWelcome. Would you like to buy some Chocobo tickets? Cloud- Yeah- Ask how to buy- Explain it to me- Not interested
Yeah Lady at the Ticket DeskRegistration fees are 200 gil. Is that all right? Cloud- Yeahhh!- No way! Lady at the Ticket DeskWhich rank would you like to select? Cloud- C (1BET 1 0 0 gil)- B (1BET 2 0 0 gil)- Quit
Ask how to buy Lady at the Ticket DeskYou are allowed a maximum of 3 bets on your Chocobo ticket.
Explain it to me Lady at the Ticket DeskThis Chocobo Race has Virtual devices on the course.They show natural scenery during the race that really doesn't exist.You pick which Chocobo will finish first and second here,And then buy the appropriate tickets.And if the ticket you purchased is a winner, you'll receive a ticket for an item that will be listed on the panel.You can exchange your tickets for items or GP at the Exchange counter to the right of the entrance.
Not interested Nothing happens.
At Battle Square, there is a staff woman standing in front of the stairs. WomanI'm sorry, we're currently renovating. Please come again. At Ghost Square, a zombie greets Cloud as he enters the hotel. ZombieWelcome. Thank you for coming to the Ghost Hotel.Uuuuuuuuuuugh......For reservations, please step up to the counter.Uuuuuuuuuuugh...... Cloud steps up to the counter, and a man in a noose drops down with a scream. ReceptionistIt's our most popular employee, Mr. Hangman. Mr. HangmanWelcome!It's 5 GP a night. Would you like to stay? Cloud- Yeah, all right- No thanks Flyer[Turtle's Paradise]No. 3Forget the bad times with a nice drink...Only thing missing in Gold Saucer is......A pub with good drinks and a great atmosphere!Stop in the "Turtle's Paradise"! If Cloud attempts to go upstairs without paying... Mr. HangmanSir... Please register at the counter!! At Round Square... Woman at Ticket BoothWelcome. This attraction is 3 GP.Shall you be riding this evening? Cloud- Yes, I shall- No, I shan't
Yes, I shall Woman at Ticket BoothWould this be your first time riding with us? Cloud- Yes, it would- No, it would not
Yes, it would Woman at Ticket BoothYou will be able to see all the different areas of Gold Saucer on this ride.So please just sit back and enjoy a lovely view you won't see anywhere else.This attraction can only ccommodate 2 passengers, so one of you please wait over there.
No, it would not Woman at Ticket BoothThis attraction can only ccommodate 2 passengers, so one of you please wait over there.
CloudWho should I ride with... Cloud selects a companion. Woman at Ticket BoothEnjoy the sights of Gold Saucer. Cloud and his companion ride the gondola.
AerithWow, how nice.Oh! Look, Cloud.It's so pretty.Cloud!Wow! TifaOh, how pretty.Look, Cloud.Oh, Cloud.Look, look.Look, there. YuffieWow!Geez!!Cloud!Oh my gawd!Geez!
If Cloud does not have enough GP to pay. Woman at Ticket BoothUm, I'm very sorry, but you do not have enough GP.
At Speed Square, a muscular man addresses Cloud when he arrives. ManHey boy. CloudBoy... ManHow is it? You having fun?Mmm, so, you ARE having fun. Well, good, good for you boy. CloudMy name's Cloud. And stop calling me boy. DioMmm? Me? I'm the owner of the Gold Saucer. The name's Dio.Just call me 'Dio'. Cloud...... (Not even listening) DioBy the way, boy, do you know what a 'Black Materia' is? Cloud- I know what it is- What is it?
I know what it is DioOh, so you do know.
What is it? DioHa ha ha...... that, I say, that's a good one, boy! But it's not good to lie. You can't fool me.
CloudWhy d'you ask me? DioWell, a while back, a boy your age came in and asked me if I had a 'Black Materia.'I thought you might know who he was, seein' as how you're both about the same age. CloudDid he happen to have... a Black Cape... DioWhy yes, yes indeed. And a tattoo on his hand that said '1'. CloudWhere did he go!? DioHa ha ha, I have no idea.Well then.I say, stop by the Battle Arena if you like, boy.You'll probably like it. Many of my collections are on display there.Ha, ha ha. He leaves. PersonWe have to be careful of these steps.What...? A lot of things... RedheadFirst, I gotta memorize the order it comes out, and then guess on the attacks...... mumble, mumble...... Onward to the roller coaster. If Cloud tries to get on without buying a ticket... Ticket PersonThis way, Sir, to register. Ticket PersonIs this your first time? First, listen to the explanation of the game over there. LadyHear the rules for this attraction? Cloud- Yes- Not interested LadyThis attraction, Shooting Coaster isWhile your ride's going ZOOM, you're going BANG BANG, and things are going PHEW PHEW and you destroy them with a big BOOM. Pretty simple, isn't it?Oh, to shoot, hit the O Button. And, the Bar that's shown on the left side of the screen is the Power Meter.When it's full, it'll go BROOOOOM and when it's empty, it'll only go BRM and become weak. So be careful.Also, if you're in the Top 3 you'll get on the Wall of Fame. Ticket PersonThis attraction costs 10 GP. Cloud- Pay- Changed my mind
If Cloud does not have enough GP to pay. Ticket Person......... You don't have enough GP
Otherwise Ticket PersonThank you.
Cloud and the others ride the coaster. Wall of Fame StafferYour score is x points.
If Cloud scored 3000-4999 points... As a price, Received "Super Sweeper/Masamune Blade/1/35 soldier"!!
If Cloud scored 5000+ points... As a price, Received "Umbrella"!!
Sometimes after coming off the roller coaster, Cloud will walk to the side and hang his head. CloudUgh... Wall of Fame StafferWould you like to see the Wall of Fame? Cloud- Yes- Not interested Cloud's current 3 high scores are displayed. Wall of Fame StafferYou'll receive a prize if you get more than 3000 Points. So good luck. Stepping back into the hallway, Cloud may encounter a couple standing there. ManHey, I finally got 5000 points. WomanWow!! You're so wonderful!! ManMan, I finally got a prize... The next time Cloud sees the couple... ManHey, I got 5000 points again. WomanWow!! You're so wonderful!! ManWell, I guess I'll go and get some more GP. Sometimes a pair of children will appear running towards the coaster. Little GirlEyyaaaaaa! Little BoyYaaay----!! ManCome on now, no running. At Event Square, the stands are empty except for some staff members and two couples sitting around. SecuritySorry but there's no show now. StafferWe put on a really unusual show here. It's not on today, but come back again sometime and see it. CoupleWhat's your problem? Can't you see we wanna be alone? Couple 2Geez, you're a real bummer. Why don't you just leave us alone? At Wonder Square, Cloud and his companion are approached by a black cat toy riding a giant stuffed moogle. Cait SithHey you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?How 'bout it? Want me to read your fortune!? A bright future! A happy future!Oh, but don't hold it against me if it's not a great prediction!Oh, so sorry! I'm a fortune telling machine. The name's...Cait Sith. CloudYou can only read the future? Cait SithYou kidding!? I can find missing things, missing people, anything! CloudThen can you tell me where a man named Sephiroth is? Cait SithSephiroth, right!?Okay, here goes!! He shakes about on his moogle, and it then hands Cloud a fortune. Cloud...Ordinary luck. It will be an active fortune.Give into the good will of others, and something big'll happen after summer. ...wait... what's this? Cait SithHuh? Let me try again. CloudBe careful of forgetfulness. Your lucky color is... blue?...Forget it. Cait SithWait, wait give me another chance!Wait! Let me try it again! Cloud...What the!?
AerithWhat? TifaWhat does it say? Red XIIIRead it out loud, Cloud. YuffieWhat is it! Tell us!
CloudWhat you pursue will be yours. But you will lose something dear. Cait SithI don't know if it's good OR bad...This's the first time I ever got something like THIS.Then shall we?
AerithWhat are you talking about? TifaExcuse me? Red XIIITo where? YuffieHuh?
Cait SithAs a fortune teller, I can't help but think about this.If I don't see what it leads to, I won't be able to relax. That's why I'm going with you!
AerithWhat are we going to do, Cloud? TifaIs it all right, Cloud? Red XIIICloud, it's all right with you? YuffieHe's weird! Cloud, don't let him come!
Cait SithI'm comin' with you no matter WHAT you say! CloudH... hey! Man in OverallsThey probably told you at the entrance, but most of the attractions at Gold Saucer only take 'GP'.They don't sell GP. You can only get 'em from the Wonder Square games or at the Chocobo Races. Chocobo MascotsLet's get lotsa GP at Wonder Square and have some fun! People Playing Wonder CatcherAll...... most......Crap!no cigar...You sure do need a lot of money here.Please...... don't...... talk to me...... right now.I get so caught up in these......Back there... Guy on Motorcycle GameHyuuuuu, BAM, BAM, BAM...Oh man, I just gotta shout. Guy on Snowboard GameNope, I'm not quitting until I clear this!I'm gonna be the wind again today! Guy Near Submarine GameWhew, I'm tired. Oh this? It seems to be out of order. Guy Near Mog Game...... Don't worry 'bout me. Go ahead and play. Cloud plays Mog House. NarrationThis is Mog's house. It's in Mog Forest on Mt. Mog.The beginning of another day in the life of a Mog.This year, Mog is pipapopupo years old. ...that's 28 in human years. He's at that age when he should be looking for a mate.But before Mog can become an adult, he first needs to learn how to fly.Even though Mog trains hard everyday... He still can't seem to get off the ground... Mog tries to fly and falls on his face. NarrationLooks like he's still got a long way to go...Here's where you come in. Help Mog learn how to fly by pushing O button and feeding him his favorite Kupo nut.But don't overfeed him. He won't be able to fly if he's too fat. Cloud feeds Mog Kupo nuts, and he hops up again. NarrationOh? It seems like Mog's decided to take another shot at it.
If Cloud fed him the wrong number of nuts... He falls flat on his face again. NarrationPoor Mog. It looks like he'll have to wait some time for a mate.Poor Mog, seems like he'll be alone for a while.
If Cloud fed him the right number of nuts... Mog takes off and makes a few circuits around the screen. NarrationHe did it! He's flying! Now, he's finally become a full-fledged Mog. Mog lands and returns to his house, taking a bow before going inside. NarrationTired but relaxed, our little Mog turns out the lights early and goes to bed. Good night, and sweet dreams...... A pink moogle appears. NarrationOh?... What's this? Here comes a female Mog! She approaches Mog's house and knocks. Mog comes out and chirps. NarrationSeems he likes her too...Now, will Mog be able to fly gracefully in front of her? Help him out with a few kupo nuts. Cloud feeds Mog Kupo nuts, and he hops up again. NarrationOh? It seems like Mog's decided to take another shot at it.
If Cloud fed Mog the wrong number of nuts... He falls on his face again. NarrationUnfortunately, he didn't make it. Poor Mog'll have to wait some time for a bride.Poor Mog, seems like he'll be alone for a while.
If Cloud fed him the right number of nuts... Mog takes off and makes a few circuits around the screen. NarrationHe's flying!! Mog was able to do it!She must have fallen for his graceful flying form. The screen goes dark. Sometime later... Mog steps out of his house. NarrationLooks like things are going good with his new Mog-friend. Time for a quiet date in the forest.Her name is Mag. She is a good-natured Mog. Mog and Mag leave the house and walk off screen. NarrationBest of luck to the both of you, Mog and Mag. May you have lots and lots of healthy Mogs! No fewer than 12 baby moogles exit the house. The last one trips and falls on his face. One of the others comes back for him and they run off. NarrationUh...no worries there, I guess... ~FIN~ The game ends. Guy Near Mog GameHmm... I'm impressed... Thanks for showing me it.Here, take this. Received 30 GP!!
Fortune Telling Machine1 fortune 50 gil Cloud- Try it- Not interested Fortune Telling MachineUse caution in relationships If Cloud tries to leave Gold Saucer via the Ropeway...
AerithAre you thinking of just us going back? TifaHey, Cloud, Are we going back without the others? Red XIIIAre we leaving the others? YuffieCloud! Are we just going to leave the others?
Returning to Battle Square, Cloud and the others arrive to find a Shinra soldier standing in front of the stairs. Cloud!! The soldier collapses, and Cloud goes over to investigate. CloudMm!?Dead......
AerithWhat!? Why? TifaWhat!? Red XIIIWhat the... YuffieWh... why?
Cloud runs off up the stairs.
AerithCloud!? Where are you going? TifaWa... wait Cloud! Red XIIIHey, Cloud! YuffieDon't, don't just leave me!
The others follow him up to the battle arena, where four more soldiers lie dead, and the staff members are slumped at their counters. CloudDid Sephiroth do this!?No... it's not him... They're all shot... Sephiroth would never use a gun... One of the Gold Saucer staffers stirs. WomanUgh, ugggh. Cloud and the others run over to her. CloudHey, what happened! WomanUgh... ugh... a man with a gun... on his arm......
AerithIt can't be!? TifaA gun on his arm!? Red XIII...did he!? YuffieWow, that's somethin!!
SecurityHold it right there! And stay quiet!! Dio enters with two security guards. DioDid you guys do this!? CloudN... no, it wasn't us! Dio (if you spoke earlier)I must've been wrong... Cait SithHurry and run, it's gonna get ugly. He runs for the arena. CloudHe...... hey! DioHold them! Cloud follows Cait Sith into the arena. DioThat's as far as you go. CloudWait, listen to... Cait SithCloud... Robots approach them from three sides, and Dio blocks the way back out... The scene changes to where Cloud is being held by one of the robots. Before him is a hatch labeled "Gateway to heaven." DioOne more to go. SecurityYes CloudHey! Pay attention!! DioThere's no need to listen. Pay for your crime down below!!Do it! SecurityYes The hatch opens, and the robot jumps in, carrying Cloud with it.
